channel.title: Bienvenu à sur ma page! :hugs: on Jean-Daniel Zucker
channel.description: Recent content in Bienvenu à sur ma page! :hugs: on Jean-Daniel Zucker

item.title: Welcome to Blowfish
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish is packed with tons of features.

The original aim of Blowfish was to develop a theme that was simple and lightweight. The theme is a fork of Congo and expands its initial vision.

item.title: Installation
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Simply follow the standard Hugo Quick Start procedure to get up and running quickly.

Detailed installation instructions can be found below. Instructions for updating the theme are also available.

Installation
#

These instructions will get you up and running using Hugo and Blowfish from a completely blank state. Most of the dependencies mentioned in this guide can be installed using the package manager of choice for your platform.

item.title: Getting Started
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
This section assumes you have already installed the Blowfish theme.

We just launched a CLI tool to help you get started with Blowfish. It will help you with installation and configuration. Install the CLI tool globally using:

item.title: Configuration
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish is a highly customisable theme and uses some of the latest Hugo features to simplify how it is configured.

The theme ships with a default configuration that gets you up and running with a basic blog or static website.

item.title: Homepage Layout
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Blowfish provides a fully flexible homepage layout. There are two main templates to choose from with additional settings to adjust the design. Alternatively, you can also provide your own template and have complete control over the homepage content.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality.

Alert
#

alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Front Matter
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: In addition to the default Hugo front matter parameters, Blowfish adds a number of additional options to customise the presentation of individual articles. All the available theme front matter parameters are listed below.

item.title: Multiple Authors
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Some websites have more than one author contributing with content and therefore require more than a single default author across the entire website. For those use-cases, Blowfish allows users to extend the list of authors using the multiple authors feature.

item.title: Partials
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Analytics
#

Blowfish provides built-in support for Fathom Analytics, Google Analytics and Umami Analytics. Fathom is a paid alternative to Google Analytics that respects user privacy.

item.title: Thumbnails
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Thumbnails
#

Blowfish was enhanced in order to make it easy to add visual support to your posts. To do so, you just need to place an image file (almost all formats are supported but we recommend .png or .jpg) that starts with feature* inside your article’s main directory, as shown in the example below.

item.title: Content Examples
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: If you’ve been reading the documentation in order, you should now know about all the features and configurations available in Blowfish. This page is designed to pull everything together and offer some worked examples that you might like to use in your Hugo project.

item.title: Series
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Blowfish provides a feature to group a set of articles together under a “series”. Placing an article under a series will display the rest of the series articles in each single page and provide a quick way to navigate amongst them. You can see an example of this above.

item.title: Advanced Customisation
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: There are many ways you can make advanced changes to Blowfish. Read below to learn more about what can be customised and the best way of achieving your desired result.

item.title: Hosting & Deployment
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
There are many ways to deploy your Hugo website built with Blowfish. The theme is designed to be flexible in almost any deployment scenario.

Blowfish is built using relative URLs throughout the theme. This enables sites to easily be deployed to sub-folders and hosts like GitHub Pages. There’s usually no special configuration required for this to work as long as the baseURL parameter has been configured in the config.toml file.

item.title: Firebase: Views & Likes
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: In order to be able to support dynamic data across your website we’ve added the support to integrate Firebase. This will allow you to use the views feature across lists and posts.

item.title: Build your homepage using Blowfish and Hugo
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Just one year ago, I created Blowfish, a Hugo theme crafted to build my unique vision for my personal homepage. I also decided to make it an open-source project. Fast-forward to today, and Blowfish has transformed into a thriving open-source project with over 600 stars on GitHub and a user base of hundreds. In this tutorial, I’ll show you how to get started and have your website running in a couple of minutes.

item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)

item.title: Blowfish テンプレート - GitHub レポジトリ
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)

item.title: Icons
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish has built-in support for a number of FontAwesome 6 icons. These can be included in your website through either the icon partial or icon shortcode.

Additionally, custom icons are also fully supported. Simply provide your own SVG icon assets by placing them in the assets/icons/ directory in the root of your project. Any icons in the icons directory will then be available to use throughout the theme. In order achieve automatic color filling every SVG path needs fill=“currentColor” XML attribute.

item.title: Markdown
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown formatting that can be used in Blowfish, also it shows how some basic HTML elements are decorated.

item.title: Rich Content
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: This is an example of a rich content summary.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Mathematical notation
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: KaTeX can be used to render mathematical notation within articles.

item.title: Charts
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Blowfish includes Chart.js for powerful charts and data visualisations.

item.title: Diagrams and Flowcharts
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: It’s easy to add diagrams and flowcharts to articles using Mermaid.

item.title: Recipe Template
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Thank you for wanting to contribute to Blowfish’s community.

How to start?
#

This is a template article that will explain how to create a new article for Blowfish’s guide section.

item.title: À propos de moi
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
1. Formation et Diplômes

    1996

    Ph.D. en Apprentissage Machine

    Obtention du doctorat à l'Université Paris 6 avec une spécialisation en apprentissage machine.

  2. Début de Carrière

    1996 - 1998

    Maître de conférences

    Premiers pas en tant que maître de conférences à l'Université Paris 6, concentré sur les changements de représentation et l'abstraction en analyse prédictive.

  3. Leadership en Recherche

    1998 - 2001

    Responsable équipe Granulab

    Direction de l'équipe CNRS "Granulab" au LIP6.

  4. Professeur d'Informatique

    2001 - 2014

    Université Paris 13

    Co-direction du laboratoire LIM&BIO (devenu LIMICS). Direction de l'équipe multi-laboratoires IAPuces, axée sur l'IA pour la médecine personnalisée.

  5. Expériences Internationales

    2011 - 2015

    Vietnam

    Poste à l'Université des Sciences et Technologies de Hanoï.

  6. Recherches Actuelles

    2015 - présent

    Responsable Integromics

    Direction du groupe "Integromics" à l'IHU ICAN de Sorbonne Université. Travaux en métagénomique, nutrigénomique, et modélisation multi-agent.

  7. Publications Clés

    2013

    Auteur

    Livre "Abstraction in Artificial Intelligence and Complex Systems" avec Lorenza Saitta. Livre "Modélisation Multi-Agent" avec Alexis Drogoul et Jean-Pierre Treuil.

  8. Programme Doctoral

    2010 - présent

    Coordinateur

    Coordination du Programme Doctoral International en Modélisation des Systèmes Complexes (PDI MSC), soutenant des étudiants du Nord et du Sud.

item.title: Advanced
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: This is the advanced tag. Just like other listing pages in Blowfish, you can add custom content to individual taxonomy terms and it will be displayed at the top of the term listing. 🚀

item.title: Campioni
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish dà vita ai tuoi contenuti. 😍

Questa sezione contiene alcune pagine demo che mostrano come Blowfish esegue il rendering di diversi tipi di contenuto. Puoi anche vedere una pagina di esempio elenco tassonomia.

item.title: Documenti
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Semplice ma potente. Scopri come utilizzare Blowfish e le sue funzionalità.

Questa sezione contiene tutto ciò che devi sapere su Blowfish. Se sei nuovo, consulta la guida Installazione per iniziare o visita la sezione Esempi per vedere cosa può fare Blowfish.

item.title: Recipes
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Recipes, guides, and tutorials for Blowfish

Blowfish user? To add your guide to this list, check the template.

This section contains guides for a variety of scenarios on how to configure your theme. If you’re new, check out the Installation guide to begin or visit the Samples section to see what Blowfish can do.

item.title: Tag
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Blowfish ha il pieno supporto per le tassonomie Hugo e si adatterà a qualsiasi impostazione tassonomica. Gli elenchi di tassonomia come questo supportano anche il contenuto personalizzato da visualizzare sopra l’elenco dei termini.

item.title: サンプル
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish はあなたのコンテンツに命を宿します。😍

このセクションは、 Blowfish で様々な種類のコンテンツをどのように表示するのかを紹介するデモページを含みます。例としては分類一覧ページも参考になります。

item.title: タグ
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Blowfish は Hugo の分類システムを完全にサポートし、どのような分類システムの設定でも適合できます。このような分類システムのリストは、用語リストの上に表示されるカスタムコンテンツもサポートしています。

item.title: ドキュメント
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
シンプル、それでいて強力。 Blowfish の利用方法と特徴について学ぶ。

このセクションでは、Blowfish について知っておくべきことをすべて網羅しています。初めての方は、まずインストールガイドをご覧いただくか、サンプルセクションで Blowfish で何ができるかを確認してみてください。

item.title: レシピ
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish のためのレシピ、ガイド、チュートリアル

Blowfish ユーザーですか? この一覧にあなたのガイドを加える際は、テンプレートを確認してください。

item.title: 使用指南
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish 的使用指南和教程

您是 Blowfish 的用户吗? 要将您自己编写的指南添加到此列表，请查看参考模板。

item.title: 文档
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
了解如何使用简单而强大的 Blowfish。

本章节包含了你需要了解的有关 Blowfish 的所有信息。如果你是新用户，请查阅安装 指南，或者访问示例 来了解 Blowfish 能做什么。

item.title: 标签
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: Blowfish 支持基于 Hugo 的所有分类方法。同时，当前的标签预览页也支持展示自定义内容。

item.title: 示例
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description:
Blowfish 让你的内容栩栩如生。 😍

本节包含一些示例页面，展示了Blowfish如何呈现不同类型的内容。你还可以参考标签页面的示例。

item.title: 高度なタグ
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: こちらは高度なタグです。 Blowfish の他のページの様に、個々の分類条項にカスタムコンテンツの追加やそれを条項リストの一番上に表示することが可能です。🚀

item.title: 高级
item.author: youremail@example.com (Jean-Daniel Zucker)
item.description: 这是高级标记。类似其他 Blowfish 中的其他列表页面，你可以在分类列表页添加自定义内容，这部分内容会显示在顶部。🚀
